messaging_disabled_not_in_group.message: You are not in this group and cannot write therefore. To join, ask another member.

messaging_disabled_device_chat.message: This chat contains locally generated messages. Therefore you cannot write any messages.

message_not_verified.message: The message was sent with non-verified encryption. See "Info" for details.

messaging_disabled_deaddrop.message: Click on a message to start accept or deny the contact request

ask_delete_chat_desktop.message: Are you sure you want to delete "%1$s"?

pref_notifications_explain.message: Enable system notifications on new messages

pref_show_notification_content_explain.message: Shows sender and first words of message content in notification

ask_delete_message_desktop.message: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

about_offical_app_desktop.message: This is the official Delta Chat Desktop app.
